text: "You Belong to the City" is a 1985 song by Glenn Frey and is taken from the television series Miami Vice. It went to number 1 in Poland, number 2 in the United States, number 6 in Canada, number 20 in Australia, number 26 in Ireland, number 37 in the Netherlands, number 46 in New Zealand and number 63 in France. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Glenn Frey songs
title: You Belong to the City
